text: Kerala Blasters FC is an indian professional association football club that competes in the Indian Super League, the top tier of Indian football. The club was established on 24 May 2014 and began their first professional season a few months later in October 2014. They play their home matches at the Jawaharlal Nehru Stadium, Kochi. ==Players== As of 23 September 2020. The List Includes All The Players Registered Under A Kerala Blasters FC Contract.
